oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-05-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 12, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer), guest performers Johnnie & Jack with Ruby Wells, Kitty Wells and Ray Crisp, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Howdy Forrester, the Jug Band, Minnie Pearl, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Pap's Jug Band; Minnie Pearl; Kitty Wells; Ray Crisp; Bashful Brother Oswald
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Prince Albert jingle -- Roy Acuff introduces the Jug Band -- Shotgun Boogie (Pap's Jug Band) -- Roy Acuff introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Roy Acuff introduces Kitty Wells and Ray Crisp -- You And Me (Kitty Wells, Ray Crisp) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Columbus Stockade Blues (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Streamlined Cannonball (Roy Acuff) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Bashful Brother Oswald; Pap's Jug Band; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Acuff, Roy; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Wright, Ruby (Vocalist); Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963; Wells, Kitty; Wells, Ruby; Crisp, Ray
